arf.query
Class QueryTrader

java.lang.Object
  arf.query.QueryTrader

public class QueryTrader
extends java.lang.Object

The query trader manages all queries of the framework.

          Returns an instance of QueryTrader class.

getInstance

public static QueryTrader getInstance()
Returns an instance of QueryTrader class.

Returns:
The singleton instance of this class.

getQuery

public ReasonerQuery getQuery(java.lang.String name)
Returns a query for the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of a query.
Returns:
The query. If no query was registered an UNKNOWN-query will be returned.

registerQuery

Parameters:

unregisterQuery

Called when a query is stopped and not available anymore by the framework.

Parameters:
